members.shortbio: Alex is the founder and CEO of Glitch Corp.

members.position: Vice President and Chief Operating Officer
members.shortbio: With over 20 years of experience, Phil is the most seasoned and diverse member of the Glitch Corp. team.
Darren creates learning materials for Glitch Corp. as well as consulting for custom solutions.
Andrew joined Glitch Corp. as its first CFO, ensuring the business financial situation is always top notch.

members.position: Vice President of Sales and Marketing
members.shortbio: Ruth is the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Glitch Corp, and manages sales worldwide.
